thread.title: Great location loved it
thread.title_full: Great location loved it - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JMANSFIELD_11
title: Great location loved it
text: I booked a deal with BA for a flight and hotel for a great price. This hotel was one of my options checked ratings and booked. It was great location is great close to everything top of rock ten mins walk central park 15 mins empire state about 25 mins away. The big bus stops for tours which is included in the new york pass are just round the corner you couldnt get any better. I emailed before we visited asking for a good view as my mums bday. We got 32nd floor room 3218. Was amazing view times square on your right hand side. We got 2 free drinks vouchers and a dessert in the room which was such a nice touch. Would stay again and advice my friends to stay here also.
